title: Advanced Learning of Redox Reactions Using Augmented Reality (AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental chemistry concepts (elements, compounds, ions)
context.additional_context: Targets learners familiar with AR learning environments using digital devices, emphasizing enhanced real-time online interaction.

learning_goals: Explain electron transfer processes in redox reactions with over 80% accuracy through AR simulations
Solve oxidation number calculation problems with 90% accuracy within 15 minutes using AR content
Analyze and present at least three real-life redox reaction cases through team-based AR activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
